Two rivals reused a prime in their RSA keys. Intercept their messages: 315823484524681088129191586653345375620240297090663942626308890961072970280735484476041595017388875408005080433098875908972381913181216259961198337311828790772418865847229506548197522131302481054385526883581494929975015277343049182. What secrets did they leak by sharing?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=678994863624052102369828862609167065949121095372183338603941938135535549624842598082953520252753871398165898796053077682870359778823769204706738767399513074307884504180152912944494858761697302198573977901080014735248512094146479641, n2=477115543044277038040989623630748066114000127923181749648348845262430169660484892730191903623784294092974213570617092100692360007476789760464481838445649112130169312329527508411232095756072521588866625370742263005647936249401801721, e=160396184629778651353771675053423264934850665093304901743578478235120768084198728391143465666976993877156766980107088026212305951835250258032625128243698769704326298080546347465627456568053352609014446452335329793342999095845623793

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{mehftoil}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 315823484524681088129191586653345375620240297090663942626308890961072970280735484476041595017388875408005080433098875908972381913181216259961198337311828790772418865847229506548197522131302481054385526883581494929975015277343049182
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=678994863624052102369828862609167065949121095372183338603941938135535549624842598082953520252753871398165898796053077682870359778823769204706738767399513074307884504180152912944494858761697302198573977901080014735248512094146479641, n2=477115543044277038040989623630748066114000127923181749648348845262430169660484892730191903623784294092974213570617092100692360007476789760464481838445649112130169312329527508411232095756072521588866625370742263005647936249401801721, e=160396184629778651353771675053423264934850665093304901743578478235120768084198728391143465666976993877156766980107088026212305951835250258032625128243698769704326298080546347465627456568053352609014446452335329793342999095845623793
extra_info: p=20220235488456202675988852237215027749291340182130673108185918269813536759202242776123201640682586254209479904969093, q=33579968146844404893491516673099820562846066880254302108223580932179060595788357880807048215526707927095182917602437, q2=23595943940250539245992998274126551778680255869051471887107902141117268350615800811004372398030599676845965204512997, φ(n)=678994863624052102369828862609167065949121095372183338603941938135535549624842598082953520252753871398165898796053023882666724478216199724337828452551200936900822119204936503445292866164342311597917047651223805441067207431323908112, φ(n2)=477115543044277038040989623630748066114000127923181749648348845262430169660484892730191903623784294092974213570617048284512931300734867778613970496866121140534118130184532214590821164950962703545279497796703549819716880804292319632
